_header: A holy woman that hight Saint Bride
_description: How St Bridget was instructed to worship the Passion — twelve couplets

BLSl3548.First Lines:
A holy wooman that hight seynt BrydeCouetid to knowe the woundys
                    wyde…
BLSl3548.Last Lines:
…That of this worlde when wee shall missehe vs induce vnto his
                    blis Amen
BLSl3548.Editions:
Cumming,  William Patterson,
                        ed.  
             The Revelations of St. Birgitta, from Garrett MS. Princeton
                University.
EETS
         o.s. 178 (1929); repr. 1987: xxxviii.
